pr_title: Add HelixRestObjectNameFactory to create namespaced ObjectName

timeline.message: Add HelixRestObjectNameFactory to create namespaced ObjectName
Add HelixRestObjectNameFactory to create namespaced ObjectName
Make HelixRestObjectNameFactory only visible within package

timeline.bodyText: Given this is an internally used class, do we expect any value that needs quote?
timeline.author: jiajunwang

replies.bodyText: I don't think it hurts to have the quote check. Eg. if we use regex, quote is needed: new ObjectName("helix*")
replies.author: huizhilu

replies.bodyText:
I personally prefer less protection so the logic fails earlier during test.
But no strong preference here.
replies.author: jiajunwang

timeline.bodyText: If you ignore 2 types of info out of 3, then this ObjectName probably does not help us monitoring. So just throw Exception?
timeline.author: jiajunwang

timeline.bodyText: Do we allow null string input or not?
timeline.author: jiajunwang

replies.bodyText: No. Hashtable has the null check. If any property is null, NPE will be thrown.
replies.author: huizhilu

timeline.bodyText: When this one is called? Do we need concurrency control?
timeline.author: jiajunwang

replies.bodyText: This will be called after a servlet is init. We don't need concurrency control same as initServlet()
replies.author: huizhilu

timeline.bodyText: What if it throw exception, will it break servlet start or something? I did not see the place to use it.
timeline.author: junkaixue

replies.bodyText: @dasahcc Good question. If exception is thrown, servlet/rest server won't be able to start. This method is used in metrics lib's JmxReporter
replies.author: huizhilu
